title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 100 - New Construction Of Distribution Lines, Service Lines And Appurtenant Facilities In Residential Subdivisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 100 - New Construction Of Distribution Lines, Service Lines And Appurtenant Facilities In Residential Subdivisions

State Regulations
§ 100.1 - New construction of underground facilities in residential subdivisions
§ 100.2 - Connection from existing electric facilities to residential subdivisions
§ 100.3 - Deposits by applicants
§ 100.4 - Cooperation by applicants
§ 100.5 - Special conditions
§ 100.6 - Repealed
§ 100.7 to 100.9 - Repealed
§ 100.10 to 100.11 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 100

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §§ 4[1], 5[2], 7[1], 16 [1], 20[1], 31[4], 51, 65[1], 66[1]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
